nodes.text: Unidentified B1 battle droid  (Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship)
Around 21 BBY, this battle droid was stationed on the bridge of a Trade Federation Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship.

When Padawan Ahsoka Tano and Pantoran senator Riyo Chuchi infiltrated the Trade Federation Lucrehulk-class Droid Control Ship in search for Chairman N. Papanoida's kidnapped daughters, the droid tracked the two as they were moving through the ship's detention area and informed Sib Canay of their presence.
The B1 battle droid, like every battle droid in The Clone Wars movie and The Clone Wars TV series, was voiced by Matthew Wood.
